intent_atoms.description: The log of blocked tasks must be updated whenever blocker status changes to maintain day‑to‑day visibility.
Import licensed real‑world assets and refresh regression baselines so tolerant parsing and export scenarios can validate against real‑world payloads once licensing approvals are obtained.
Licensing approvals for Dolby Vision, AV1, VP9, Dolby AC-4, and MPEG‑H fixtures must be secured before importing assets.
Execute the macOS 1 GiB lenient‑vs‑strict benchmark once macOS hardware with the 1 GiB performance fixture becomes available.
The benchmark must run with ISOINSPECTOR_BENCHMARK_PAYLOAD_BYTES=1073741824, collect runtime and RSS metrics, and archive them under Documentation/Performance/.

functional_units.name: Import Licensed Assets
functional_units.description: Imports licensed media assets into the system and refreshes regression baselines for tolerant parsing and export validation.

functional_units.name: Execute macOS Benchmark
functional_units.description: Runs a macOS performance benchmark with a 1 GiB payload, collects runtime and RSS metrics, and archives results in Documentation/Performance.
